title: Su Xi Dongwuyuan
synopsis: "Suhi's Zoo" tells the story of the cute yellow duckling Witzy, the teddy bear friend Boof who is always with Witzy and other animal companions. )translated from iqiyi(

title: Kuaile De Ai Luo Ka
synopsis: Eloka and his friends live in a place where snow and ice are all year round. The cold weather and the monotony of life make them listless. Ai Roka wanted to make everyone happy and proposed to play games, but the games are always the same and very boring...Finally, a sudden blizzard brought them a music box, which made friends who have never seen a music box before. I was very curious. In the process of scrambling and playing around, I accidentally opened the music box and found that there was a band standing inside with beautiful music... Everyone was immediately fascinated. However, in the end the music box was accidentally destroyed and the beautiful sound was gone, but the friends had a great interest in music, so they decided to search for all kinds of beautiful sounds in life, and their love for music And the fun of finding music makes their cold and boring winter fun and interesting (translated from iqiyi)

title: Le Le Hu De Jia
synopsis: "Le Le Tiger’s Home" Le Le Tiger and his friends play together. There are many wonderful and interesting stories in life. The friends are always so whimsical and they will encounter many life problems during play. Security issues. Dad tiger and mother tiger will teach them some safety knowledge and life methods so that they can learn to protect themselves. Help them establish safety awareness, develop good living habits, and learn to communicate with others. Friends are always so whimsical. A happy little tiger lives in a beautiful, quiet and peaceful small village, as well as a group of kind, simple and friendly people. Everything here is so beautiful. Different interesting stories happen every day. Every day, Dadhu will go out to work in exchange for the superior living conditions of his family. He will also play with the children after get off work, and will teach them all kinds of common sense and scientific knowledge of life and the principles of life. He is a typical ordinary family father, reliable, stable, and the existence that his family relies on, not only looks like(translated from iqiyi)

title: Kyōryū chōsekai
synopsis: Amazing Dinoworld (japanese: Dinosaur Superworld) is a 2019 documentary co-produced by both NHK and Curiosity Stream. It focuses on dinosaurs and has two episodes. The Feathered Revolution, which focuses on feathered dinosaurs. The World of Sea Monsters, which focuses on marine reptiles like moasasaurs. (Source: tvtropes.org)

title: My Last Day
synopsis: The story unfolds through the eyes of a criminal who receives the same crucifixion sentence as Christ. The criminal's own guilt causes him to realize more fully Christ's innocence. "My Last Day" is a short film of regret, repentance and redemption that frames the story of salvation in a new and refreshing way that will capture the attention of a new generation. Source: TMDb

title: Fengkuang De Zhangyu
synopsis: This is a funny comedy about 5 octopus friends who live in a boring fish tank and watch the sea through the window. Even spend a lot of time discussing various crazy escape plans. Will they succeed in the end? (translated from iqiyi)

title: Hao Haizi Xiao Ketang
synopsis: This film is a two-dimensional cartoon based on the national elementary school English, Chinese and mathematics new curriculum standards. Each episode highlights a knowledge point through the form of "animation + game" (the animation part is the learning of knowledge points or the application of knowledge points in real life, and the game part is the practice and practice of the previously learned knowledge points. Consolidation), so that children can smoothly master the knowledge points during the happy process of listening to stories and playing games, and then deepen their memories.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Qin Qin Xiao Ke
synopsis: In a warm and sweet family, the innocent dog Xiao Ke and other small animals live happily in their yard, passing on the harmonious and intimate relationship between pets and people, and educating children from childhood Love animals, love partners, love family. (translated from iqiyi)

title: You Xi Hou
synopsis: You Xihou, one of China's most popular original anime stars. Yoyo's expression is very surprising. Yoyo lives in a beautiful seaside village. There are many good friends who grew up with Yoyo in the village, as well as the "goddess" in Yoyo's heart. Hehe, but Yoyo really wants to catch up with hehe , I still have to work hard to please my heart. (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 幸福在身边-当地雷锋郭明义的故事

title: Tiexue Yang Jia Jiang
synopsis: It tells the story of the four generations of the Yang family breaking through the heavens, fighting against Jinshan, and the twelve female generals conquering the west and defending the northern borders and serving the country with loyalty. (translated from bilibili)

title: Gang Zi Tegong Dui
synopsis: The cartoon tells the story of the little robot "Steel Boy" joining the Robot Planet Commando team, defending the Robot Planet together with his companions and guarding his home. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiongdi Jiemei Yijia Qin
synopsis: The cartoon "Brothers and Sisters and One Family" is the first cartoon in my country that combines a large historical span with a specific story, telling the long history of the Chinese nation and the history of 56 ethnic relations. The film focuses on reasoning in the narrative, revealing the historical process of the Chinese nation's pluralistic integration, symbiosis and mutual complementation, and common development and progress. It recalls the historical destiny of the people of all ethnic groups who share the same hatred, resist foreign aggression and fight against foreign aggression in modern times. It explains the socialist ethnic relations of equality, unity, mutual assistance and harmony formed by all ethnic groups under the leadership of the party since the founding of New China. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Long Gui Zhi Long Xing Tianxia
synopsis: The story tells the story of the protagonist's journey to find roots in Tingzhou Prefecture, one of the three Hakka states, and Luoyang, Puyang, Henan, where the Hakkas moved south. Through storytelling, the origin and historical content of the Hakka people were shown to the teenagers, which demonstrated the positive and positive aspects of the Hakka people's hardworking, hardworking, thrifty, pioneering and enterprising. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Long Zhi Gu Zhi Xiang Qian Ba Shaonian
synopsis: "Go ahead! Teenager is based on the online game "Dragon Nest" (Dragon Nest) Atria as the background of the story, telling the story of Preli Town's cockroach warriors gathering brave and enthusiastic partners to explore the mysterious dragon legend on the mainland. The film restores the fun game life of Gu fans with a humorous, relaxed and funny story style. This micro-animation series has created a precedent for 3D animation in online games, and will surely give players a more realistic and delicate peak visual enjoyment. (translated from bilibili)

title: Qingqing Qi E Leyuan
synopsis: A group of lively and lovely little penguins live in Qing Qingdao. The great pirate Muschke and his pirate ship who wished to rule the world broke the peace of Qingqingdao. He racked his brains to drive the little penguins from Qingqingdao. In order to protect their homeland, the little penguins united as one, used their wisdom and courage to defeat the big pirate's conspiracy and tricks, and launched a series of wonderful stories about fighting wits and courage with Muschke. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Da Erduo Yeye Lixian Ji
synopsis: In ancient times, the black hole master invaded the universe, and everything was dark. The big ear grandfather who guarded the heavens expelled the black hole master with the help of the mother of Nuwa, and the universe saw the glory. But for thousands of years, the black hole master has not died in illusory darkness. In the world, he injected evil energy into the little comet, shaped her into a generation of comet goddess, and instructed the comet goddess to form a "universal freedom army" in the heavens, disrupting the world and destroying the peace of the universe. So Grandpa Big Ears set off from Jueshan , Riding a green bull, carrying a happy son, and walking along the Dan River according to the heavenly picture given by the Nvwa Empress, embarking on a journey of twenty-eight nights. After refining the Beidou, tethering the sun, propagating the ecliptic, and supporting the moon, many battles, Finally completed the important task of recruiting twenty-eight lodges. Then, Grandpa Big Ears activated Ruyi Spoon and directed the 28 lodges to form a "Five-Color Skynet" and expelled the black hole cave owner to Jiuzhongtian. The goddess of comet was also closed by Grandfather Dears to study in the Jueshan Cultivation Cave Regret. Twenty-eight nights guard the moon goddess ascending to the sky, and they are arranged in 28 sky regions, each taking care of one side, and guarding the peace of the universe.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Feiyue Wuqian Nian
synopsis: With five thousand years of Chinese history as the background, with the year of the thousand-year-old animal and the Beijing girl Xiaowu as the main characters, with classic historical figures and historical stories as the theme, it tells the story of Nian He Xiaowu roaming Chinese history and looking for the light of Chinese civilization. The Year of the Thousand Years of the Animal A full meal. On New Year’s Eve, in order to catch up with a delicious vegetable that was too blank, the New Year accidentally fell to the earth, her body shrank, her mana was lost, and her body was bleached. Xiao Wu, a Beijing girl standing on the street watching the fireworks, was dropped from the sky Hit by (translated from iqiyi)

title: A Mi Luo Ge Hai Qi Yuan
synopsis: Ami Luo, a 6-year-old Zhuang girl, travels with her parents to Yufeng Mountain, the hometown of Liu Sanjie. Under the guidance of the mysterious nature, Amiruo accidentally awakened the magic flute spirit that had been sleeping for a thousand years and became its new owner. The magic flute spirit passed the sapphire hydrangea passed down by the third sister Liu to the new owner Ami Luo. After the evil night elf king learned that the new owner of the sapphire hydrangea had appeared, he sent his subordinate Xiao Hei to lure Amilo and his party into the fairy kingdom. In the ancient city of the Elf Kingdom, Amiluo and his party teamed up with the Elf Queen and Elf Princess to defeat the evil night elf king. (translated from iqiyi)

title: A Mi Luo Zhi Kongzhong Dalu
synopsis: Amilo's Air Continent" tells the fantasy journey of a Zhuang girl, Amilo, and her companions on the air continent. Through the story of Amilo's adventures in the air continent and gaining friendship, it is fun to teach and promote the spirit of unity, friendship, mutual help and fear of hardship, which has positive educational significance for modern children. The story is strangely conceived and rich in imagination, and the scenes in the film are magnificent and weird, which are worth looking forward to. (translated fom iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Shi Nengliang
synopsis: The battle of Ku Le and others against the Queen of the Moon continued. Cool music gathered all the elements of happiness, burst out the ultimate power of happiness, defeated the Moon Queen, regained the ancient Rubik's Cube, solved the curse of the residents of Music Castle, and won the battle. But just as everyone was celebrating, Maureen took the opportunity to steal the ancient Rubik's Cube, and Cool Music will face a new test! (translated from iyouku)

title: Shang Sheng Fanli
synopsis: The play depicts a strange man in our country. He has many times in his life, but he always retreats and retreats. He started from scratch many times in his life and made three dollars, but he always scattered his money among the poor. He is the originator of our country's great statesman, military strategist, and businessman Fan Li. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Zhu Cheng Man Youji
synopsis: The film tells Bengbu's human geography, myths and legends, flavor snacks and the great achievements of contemporary economic and social development. Each episode has a story, so that the audience has a deep understanding of the historical city of Bengbu. (translated from bilibili)

title: Ba Ke Yachi Shai Taiyang
synopsis: Tian Qi always bullies the short, fat, honest female colleague eggplant. Due to the size of the eggplant, it is difficult to find the Prince Charming in his heart. Tian Qi often makes suggestions for eggplant, but they are all bad ideas. Unexpectedly, after a collision of little things, Tian Qi and Eggplant found that they were the most important people in their hearts, and they performed a humorous story about their friends. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Wu Shui Qi Yuan Mingzhu Chuan
synopsis: Legend has it that in the southern part of China, the mountains are undulating and the sea of clouds is vast. It seems that the spiritual energy of the heavens and the earth gathers here. Dragons and phoenixes and gods are practicing in this mountain, guarding the legend in the holy mountain. It is a land where the essence of the five waters of life is gathered. An unknown secret is hidden in the land. A crisis is brewing between the heavens and the earth. The battle between man, god and magic is about to begin. (translated from bilibili)

title: Jizhan Qi Lun
synopsis: According to legend, there is a planet that is 1,000 light years away from the earth called the odd wheel star. On the odd wheel star, there are countless people living on the odd wheel. According to legend, these Qilun people will come to the earth a thousand miles away, looking for partners from all the children on the earth who love to play Qilun shooting. The story began when a fourth-grade elementary school student named Lieyan Qilun of the fire race was selected as his partner. During the competition, Koichi and Ryeyan continued to develop friendship and made many friends. : Dolly and Genshui, Xio and Shenmu, Yafei and Golden Horn, Four Thousand and Tuyan... title: Mo Dan Wang
synopsis: The King of Magic Bullet tells that in 2030, junior high school student Ling Qili picked up a magic bullet on the playground. Magic bullets can enter the space of different dimensions to fight against summoned beasts. Children who hold magic bullets and manipulate the summoned beasts to fight are called magic bullet fighters. Ling Qili knows and knows his own magic bullet "Blasting Flame Dragon", and group with a few friends The team participated in the magic bullet contest. As the game progresses, a crisis in a different dimension gradually emerges. What is even more shocking is that this crisis will be used by negative forces, with the goal directed at the earth. Ling Qili and his friends worked together, defying hardships and dangers, defeating powerful opponents one after another, saving different dimensions of space, and defending the earth. (traslated from iqiyi)

title: Ji Jia Xuanfeng Jizhan Pian
synopsis: It tells about the moon controlled by the black hole empire. The Galactic Alliance composed of AI warriors such as sky swords, guns, and gleaming shoulders the important responsibility of exploring mysterious space and maintaining peace in the universe. (translated from tenceng)

title: Ji Jia Xuanfeng Zhi Xingji Haidao
synopsis: The Interstellar Pirates of Mecha Tornado is adapted from the popular children's robot fighting game of the same name. Continuing the huge universe background in the game, presenting the most passionate and cool 3D robot battles for children! In this game, the strongest AI warrior in the universe will meet Solomon's overlord interstellar pirate. The pirate captain Ollie owns the legendary interstellar floating cannon. A 4-person team consisting of sky swords, chain blades, guns, and flares will face the strongest enemy ever! And the black hole empire lurking in the dark is watching all this silently, a huge conspiracy enveloped Solomon's star field. After all, what kind of story is behind the pirate captain Ollie, and can the AI fighters smash the black hole empire's conspiracy? (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tu Xiao Bei Chengyu Gushi
synopsis: Behind every short, succinct, profound and meaningful idiom, there is a very interesting and profound historical story. It can stand the test of time. It is a cultural treasure that has been deposited in the five thousand years of our Chinese history. It tells about life Various reasons. In the album, many popular idioms that are widely used in daily life are selected in the album. They are transformed into idioms through the cute and lively and full of individualized animal images-Rabbit Xiaobei, Rabbit Xiaomei, Xiong Xiaole, Doudouzhu and other animated characters The protagonist in the story presents the familiar idiom stories to the children in vivid, interesting, easy-to-understand, graphic animation, to improve the children's ability to use idioms and accumulate beautiful language vocabulary; to help them understand history and broaden their horizons; Learn knowledge and enlighten wisdom; be acquainted with reason and reason, feel and inherit the excellent traditional Chinese culture. The exquisite animated scenes in the idioms of the rabbit Xiaobei idioms, the vivid and interesting storyliness, energy-saving inspire children's interest in learning (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tu Xiao Bei Gongyi Guanggao
synopsis: Themed stories of safety education, ecology and environmental protection, and humanities etiquette are used to personally restore the incident with cute cartoon images, allowing children to watch the animation as if they were on the scene and experience it. In order to learn all kinds of good habits and knowledge of charity and public welfare, to cultivate a good baby who is willing to help others, respect the old and love the young. (translated from youku)

title: Tu Xiao Bei Zhi Dongwu Qi Yuan
synopsis: "Bunny Rabbit: Animal Romance" is narrated in the form of concise and short stories. The plot of each episode is not coherent. In each episode of witty animation, Xiaobei and his friends will interact with the children to ask questions , To understand a wealth of animal knowledge together. Exquisite animation scenes and friendly interactive question and answer allow children to learn easily while watching the animation, expand their knowledge, answer the puzzles in their hearts, and stimulate their interest in learning. (translated from youku)

title: Tu Xiao Bei Zhi Shenqi De Da Ziran
synopsis: Who is the first to know that spring is here? What kinds of plants are there? Why does the tree grow taller? With distinctive animal images such as Rabbit Xiaobei, Rabbit Xiaomei, Xiong Xiaole, and Doudouzhu as the protagonists, they lead the children into the magical natural world, unfolding a beautiful natural picture for the children, and opening a wonderful experience Nature tour. The magical nature of Rabbit Xiaobei is narrated in multiple episodes in the form of concise short stories, and each episode is not coherent. In each episode of the animation, Xiaobei Rabbit and his friends go out outdoors and take the children to the beautiful natural scenery. This series of animations are mainly in the form of mutual questioning and answering between Xiaobei Rabbit and his friends, coupled with exquisite animation scene display and animation demonstration of related knowledge, to deduce the boring knowledge with interesting animations, and let the children In the joyous atmosphere of watching the animation, we learn more about natural knowledge and stimulate their thirst for knowledge and learning. By watching the "Fantastic Nature" series of animations, children will get closer to and love nature. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 兔小贝之神奇的大自然

title: Tu Xiao Bei Yuyan Gushi
synopsis: Traditional allegory stories are short and exquisite, concise and concise. They use metaphors and obscure stories to express meaningful principles, which are difficult and difficult to understand. From the perspective of children, the Fables of Rabbit Xiaobei uses Chinese ancient and modern fables, animal fables, idiom fables, foreign fables and other difficult and difficult stories to live on the screen with cartoon images that children like, which completely arouses children's interest. Coupled with the perfect fusion of colorful pictures and wonderful fables, and telling things through scenes, the fables are no longer difficult and difficult to understand, but become more accessible and easy to understand for children. In the relaxed atmosphere of watching animated videos, children can diverge their thinking and imagination, integrate themselves into the story, and experience the plot with the protagonist of the story. Through the rich imagination, the children empathize with the protagonist in the story. At the same time, they not only understand what is true and false, and how to distinguish between good and evil, but also understand many principles of life, so that children can become better in the future people.(translated from youku)

title: Tu Xiao Bei Xin Bian Shi Wan Ge Weisheme
synopsis: "A Hundred Thousand Whys Newly Edited by Rabbit Xiaobei" carefully created a complete children's video series, using animation production methods to deduce things and problems in daily life with cartoon characters. Let the children look happy and remember easily. (translated from youku)

details.Japanese: 兔小贝新编十万个为什么

title: Tu Xiao Bei Gongyi Guanggao Xilie
synopsis: The public service advertisement of Tu Xiaobei takes the cute Rabbit Xiaobei as the protagonist, and the distinctive animals such as the rabbit egg and Xiong Xiaole as the supporting characters. Through each scene story, children learn how to care for others, care for the environment, and be civilized and polite. Each episode of animation has soft and full colors and vivid stories full of childlike interest. Its content includes humanistic care, ecological and environmental protection, social civilization, civilized travel, public safety and other charitable public welfare themes, which set a model for promoting virtue and spreading love civilization. (translated from tenceng)

title: Tu Xiao Bei Shuxue Ketang
synopsis: The Mathematics Classroom of Rabbit Xiaobei is a kind of teaching concept that integrates kindergarten, closely follow the key points of enlightenment education, carefully made stepwise mathematics enlightenment video, abstract into image, take advantage of children’s interest in animation, and guide children to learn mathematics in the form of personal teaching with cartoon characters. Let children experience mathematics visually and intuitively, mobilize children's enthusiasm and curiosity for mathematics. The contents of the Rabbit Mathematics class include recognition of numbers, number and quantity, space, finding rules, ratios, shapes, concepts of numbers, classification, and sorting. Incorporate all kinds of mathematics knowledge for children of this age into the corresponding animation scenes, and separate different learning levels, so that they can happily watch the animation, through the interpretation of the animation characters, as if they have experienced personal experience. Kind of numbers, understand abstract formulas, know how to compare the size, amount, weight, length, etc. of things, stimulate interest in learning, develop mathematical thinking, and cultivate independent problem-solving (translated from iqiyi)

title: Tu Xiao Bei You E Gushi (Qimeng Ban)
synopsis: "Antique Poems for Toddlers (Enlightenment Edition)" is based on the characteristics of children at this stage, and is narrated in the form of short and diverse short stories. The plot of each episode is not coherent. The animated stories and scenes are close to the imagery and charm of the Tang poetry content, and the plot is rich. The vivid image is a Tang poem with a story, which makes the enlightenment teaching more interesting; the easy-to-understand appreciative content enlightens children’s thinking and enables them to accumulate rich knowledge; clear, accurate, and emotional phonetic recitation can make children follow In reading, I can appreciate the beauty of ancient rhyme in Tang poetry, improve recitation ability and cultural cultivation, arouse rich imagination, and fall in love with ancient poetry without knowing it.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Shentong Xiang Tuo
synopsis: This cartoon is based on Xiang Lu, known as the "Master of Confucius", and reproduces the story of Xiang Lu, a prodigy child in the Spring and Autumn Period. It vividly shows an ambitious, intelligent, optimistic, strong, courteous, diligent and studious. Lovely and smart image of ancient child prodigy. (translated from tenceng)

title: Xing Yu Xing Yuan
synopsis: At a distance of 20.32 million light-years from the earth, there is a planet named Xingmeng Garden. There are twelve virtue envoys and a group of inhabitants who believe in virtue. The Star Dream Garden is famous for its virtues, and people from all planets like to travel here. The residents of the Star Dream Garden hope to spread the twelve virtues to the entire universe, so they established the Star Wish Academy for children from other planets to come and study for one year.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Jian Mu Chuanqi
synopsis: The story happened a long time ago. 　　 At the end of history, not long before the beginning of chaos, before the beginning of myth. There is a story circulating on the earth. The story says: One day, when a storm of desire destroys the pillars of faith, a new era will come. At that time, Kunlun Mountain will collapse into ruins, the sun and the moon will hang side by side in the sky, and the haze will cover from one end of the world to the other. 　　The gods descended on the earth, either to rebuild a new order, or to achieve their ambitions, united with mortals and started war. The war between light and darkness has swept through everything, and the realm of gods and humans will be engulfed in it. 　　The latest mega-film and epic animation series "Legend of Jianmu" was launched on April 3, 2011 at the 48th Cannes International TV Festival! 　　 (translated from douban)
background:
On December 4, 2012, "Legend of Jianmu" won the "Best Animated Series Serial Award" in the 2012 Chinese Animation "Monkey Award"!
(translated from douban)

title: Fengkuang Xiao Tang
synopsis: In the magic dream candy jar, nothing is impossible, any dream can be realized! In order to become a great steamed bun master, the protagonist Ruan Xiaotang has gone through the storm and finally achieved his goal in life. During the period, Fudge and his super good friend Pu Dao Ding took classes together and worked in the "Packed Good" restaurant. A lot of interesting things happened, which brought endless joy to the peaceful dream candy jar. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Fengkuang Xiao Tang season2
synopsis: "Crazy Candy Season 2" will continue the story of "Crazy Candy Season 1", and will continue to tell a series of interesting and funny stories around the protagonist Soft Candy! (translated from youku)

title: Fengkuang Xiao Tang season3
synopsis: Everyone has a dream, and so does every candy! In order to become the greatest steamed bun chef, Fudge honed his culinary skills in the most famous steamed bun shop in the dream sugar bowl (the package is delicious). However, the road of dreams is destined to not be smooth sailing at the feet of this curious, hyperactive, and childish little character like Ruantang. Mr. Gua, the owner of a sushi restaurant, a competitor who packs delicious food, found a mysterious treasure map. According to the indications on the treasure map, the huge treasure is hidden in the delicious package. Mr. Gua's self-confident plan is always ruined in a funny and funny way by unknowing jellybeans, good friends, pudding and others. For the sake of the treasure, Mr. Gua swallowed his breath and continued to rack his brains to find a way. , Repeatedly compete with the Bao Hao Ya everyone, continue to dig the road of treasure. (translated from youku)

title: Fengkuang Xiao Tang season4
synopsis: In order to seize the treasure, Mr. Gua has formulated various plans that he thinks is seamless. Unknowingly packs delicious people, such as cute and noisy soft candy, silly pudding, etc. in a funny and funny way. Wrongly destroyed Mr. Gua's plan and created all kinds of fun. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Fengkuang Xiao Tang season5
synopsis: Everyone has a dream, and so does every candy! In order to become the greatest steamed bun chef, Soft Candy continues to work and hone his cooking skills in the most famous snack bar of Dream Sugar Can. However, the road of dreams is destined to not be smooth sailing at the feet of this curious, hyperactive, and childish little character like Ruantang. He and his good friend Putoding, as well as all kinds of eccentric friends in the candy world, have experienced ups and downs, big and small, and even made by themselves, but fortunately, they are strong and brave, positive and optimistic, and can always use funny And solve everything in a funny way. Fudge is relentlessly on the road of dreams... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Fengkuang Xiao Tang season6
synopsis: In the central square of the food world, there is a gourmet food truck that opens every day on time. The owner of the food truck is a top chef who volunteers to become a top chef and his food assistant puddings. The food truck is taking orders every day China continues to hone its cooking skills, to be a gourmet restaurant with five-star praise, and to live a happy life is its dream. However, he met the villain, Mr. Gua, and everything didn't let him go. On the way to pursue his dream, Mr. Gua had a series of ridiculous stories, ups and downs, and colorful. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Qicai Shijie
synopsis: In a beautiful forest, there lived Taotao, Hanhan, Feifei, Ding Ding and Jiaojiao. They are smart, lively, humorous, sincere and kind, and they will always understand extraordinary truths in ordinary lives. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Meng Duoduo
synopsis: Meng Duoduo is a magical and interesting town. It exists somewhere on the earth. No one knows where it is. No one has seen it, but it does exist, just like our world. Even more exciting than our world. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Dou Zhanshen
synopsis: The original hilarious 3D animation ``God of War'' series is a new work created by Duwan Virtual Impression Studio. It is another masterpiece that interprets Western tourists from a new perspective after the League of Legends ``La La La De Marcia'' animation. It describes the relationship and contradictions between mortals and gods and ghosts from another side. The animated version of "War God" is based on the game story background, but uses funny and satirical techniques to portray the lives of various legendary characters. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Cheng Chang Riji
synopsis: Ah Wei and Da Zhuang's family live in the same community. Ah Wei’s father is a computer animator and his mother is a doctor. They adopt an educational attitude of equality, mutual love, encouragement and tolerance towards Ah Wei. The big and strong father is the boss of the big company, and the mother is the housewife. They always meet all the material requirements of the child, but do not pay attention to the inner world of the child. Children from these two families will always react completely differently when encountering the same thing. The story of the film arouses parents' thinking. (translated from youku)

title: Chengzi Gushi
synopsis: There are two oranges, lost in the desert. They are very, very thirsty..." Ah, do you see the above sentence? Everyone has two oranges trekking hard in the desert, round and round but never selling cute, vitality Full of but only funny lost oranges? (translated from iqiyi)

title: Ben Ben De Xingfu Shenghuo Zhi Xingfu Huayuan
synopsis: Stupid Happy Life-Happy Homeland": The story tells the story of father and mother moving into the new home of Happy Garden with Stupid and Coco. They met a lot of new friends here, lived happily with everyone, and happened. Lots of funny episodes. (translated forom baidu)

details.Japanese: 笨笨的幸福生活之幸福花园

title: Ben Ben De Xingfu Shenghuo Zhi Kaixin Linju
synopsis: The Happy Neighbor of Stupid and Happy Life": Tells about the happy life between Stupid, Tiantian, Ranran and Qiqi and other children, through a simple life story to teach and enjoy (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 笨笨的幸福生活之开心邻居
